title: Congratulating the Shaker High School Boys Cross Country Team along with Head Coach Ed Springstead and Assistant Coach Don Myers upon the occasion of capturing the New York State and Federation Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION congratulating the Shaker High School Boys Cross
Country Team along with Head Coach Ed Springstead  and  Assistant  Coach
Don  Myers  upon the occasion of capturing the New York State and Feder-
ation Championship

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling in them the value of  teamwork,  encouraging  a  standard  of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  congratu-
late  the  Shaker  High  School Boys Cross Country Team, along with Head
Coach Ed Springstead and Assistant Coach Don Myers upon the occasion  of
winning  their  first  ever  class AA New York State Championship with a
total of 58 points on November 13, 2010, at Lakeside  Park  in  Pauling,
New York; and
  WHEREAS,  Furthermore,  The Shaker High School Boys Cross Country Team
continued on, and  captured  the  Federation  Championship,  earning  68
points leaving an unbelievable margin of defeat on November 20, 2010, at
Bowdoin Park in Wappingers Falls, New York; and
  WHEREAS,  The  athletic  talent displayed by this team is due in great
part to the efforts of Coaches Ed Springstead and  Don  Myers,  both  of
whom  are  skilled and inspirational tutors, respected for their ability
to develop potential into excellence; and
  WHEREAS, The team's  overall  record  is  outstanding,  and  the  team
members  were  loyally  and  enthusiastically supported by family, fans,
friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS, The hallmarks of the Shaker High School  Boys  Cross  Country
Team,  from the opening game of the season to participation in the cham-
pionship, were a brotherhood of athletic ability, of good sportsmanship,
of honor and of scholarship, demonstrating that these team  players  are
second to none; and
  WHEREAS,  Athletically  and academically, the team members have proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS, Coaches Ed Springstead and Don Myers have done a  superb  job
in  guiding,  molding and inspiring the team members toward their goals;
and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment; Coaches Ed Springstead and Don Myers and the Shaker High
School Boys Cross Country  outstanding  athletes  have  clearly  made  a
contribution  to  the spirit of excellence which is a tradition of their
school; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  the  Shaker  High  School  Boys  Cross  Country  Team; its
members:  Christian Delago, Mike Libruk, Casey Gilboy, Kyle Foster, Ryan
Recchia, Adam Schwenzfeier, and  Jonathan  Vallecorsa;  and  Coaches  Ed
Springstead  and  Don Myers on their outstanding season and overall team
record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Shaker High School Boys Cross Country Team  and  to  Head
Coach Ed Springstead and Assistant Coach Don Myers.
